skills.title: Small Business Sites
skills.description: Empower your small business with a professional and responsive website tailored to your unique needs. From design to launch, I create user-friendly sites that help you connect with customers and grow your brand.

skills.title: Website Maintenance
skills.description: Keep your website fresh and engaging with comprehensive maintenance services. I handle copy and image updates, design changes, and debugging to ensure your site remains attractive, functional, and up-to-date.

skills.title: SEO Optimization
skills.description: Boost your online visibility and attract more customers with expert SEO optimization. I optimize your website's content, structure, and keywords to improve your search engine rankings and drive organic traffic.

skills.title: E-commerce Websites
skills.description: Set up a powerful online presence with my e-commerce website services. I specialize in creating stunning, easy-to-navigate e-commerce sites using Shopify, helping you sell your products to grow and reach more customers.
